nodes.text: Star Wars: The Art of Dave Dorman

Star Wars: The Art of Dave Dorman is a record of work by the artist Dave Dorman. It was published by Friedlander Publishing Group in August 1996. This book features many full color images of Dorman's various book and comic covers as well as other miscellaneous pieces he has produced for the Star Wars universe.

Dave Dorman's art has graced the covers of Star Wars comic books, paperbacks, and CDs, and has appeared on trading cards and even toy packages. This book contains the most complete record of one artist's catalog of work based on his favorite subject... Star Wars!
